channel.title: CVE Feed for moziloCMS -- moziloCMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for moziloCMS -- moziloCMS

item.title: CVE-2024-2245|2024-08-01T19:03:39.451Z -- mozilocms -- mozilocms
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in moziloCMS version 2.0. By sending a POST request to the '/install.php' endpoint, a JavaScript payload could be executed in the 'username' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-2245|2024-06-04T17:30:30.557Z -- mozilocms -- mozilocms
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in moziloCMS version 2.0. By sending a POST request to the '/install.php' endpoint, a JavaScript payload could be executed in the 'username' parameter.
